Description: Professional audio plugins and processing tools
gtm_strategy_summary: Waves Audio employs a multi-channel B2B2C approach targeting professional audio engineers, music producers, and studios through direct sales, dealer networks, and subscription models. Their strategy focuses on industry partnerships, educational content, and leveraging their established reputation in the professional audio market to drive both individual and enterprise sales.
gtm_gaps_opportunities: ['Limited digital marketing presence and social selling compared to newer audio software competitors who leverage influencer partnerships and social media more effectively', 'Pricing strategy could be modernized with more flexible subscription tiers and freemium models to compete with cloud-native audio tools', 'Customer success and retention programs appear underdeveloped for maximizing lifetime value from their subscription base']
